attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
Absolutely disgusting I seen the Lorax on here. It was the most racist, homophobic, sexist site I ever went on 🤧. It scared me so bad. It’s absolutely disgraceful. I have one thing to say👇🏻
Go on a cruise💕💖✨🧚🏻 but make it the titanic 🦋💞🌸

Bernie 2020 ❤️🥰🥺

Make America great again🇵🇷
